entities.description: Incidents related to the illegal possession, sale, use, or manufacture of drugs and narcotics.
Incidents related to the possession, sale, or use of equipment used to ingest, prepare, or manufacture drugs.
Engaging in sexual relations with a close family member that is illegal and prohibited by law.
Sexual intercourse with a minor who is below the statutory age of consent.
Creation, possession, distribution, or exhibition of obscene materials including pornography.
Engaging in betting or wagering activities that are illegal or unregulated.
Engaging in sexual activities in exchange for money or goods.
The act of recruiting, harboring, transporting, providing, or obtaining a person for commercial sex acts through force, fraud, or coercion.
The willful (non-negligent) killing of one human being by another.
Non-consensual sexual contact or behavior, including rape and fondling.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the reporting of drug/narcotic violations.
Relates the survey to the reporting of drug equipment violations.
Indicates the inclusion of data related to sexual assault or violence in the survey.
Indicates the inclusion of data related to human trafficking for commercial sex acts.
Relates the survey to incidents of murder or non-negligent manslaughter.
